title: Bug: Can't reply to posts
body:
### Description

I don't know if this is a bug, per se, but I can't reply to any posts in Darksky. The option is greyed out (though I can repost and heart).

### Steps To Reproduce

1. open Darksky
2. view posts
3. can't reply

### App Version

v0.5.17

### Windows Version

24H2
author: QHudspeth

title: Spec: .NET 9 NativeAOT shipping progress
body: The app should be ported to .NET 9 on UWP. A test app called WarElephant has been created to attempt this, and there is an ongoing discussion in UWPC about porting the app and fixing #29 in the process.
author: Lamparter

comments.body: Lets use the old issue to track .net 9 as it also will remind to test arm64

comments.body: So I added the library but it does not work??
Mica has been added on Windows 10. Apparently 10Mica does not work in my secondary monitor so I thought it was bugged lmao

> Mica has been added on Windows 10. Apparently 10Mica does not work in my secondary monitor so I thought it was bugged lmao

@FireCubeStudios yeah, multi-monitor support isn't implemented yet

title: YOU ARE MY IDOL!
body: Just wanted to say, you are one of the coolest developers, and I look up to you! One day I wanna be as good a dev as you!
author: WooRepo

comments.body: Thanks, if you ever need help for dev be sure to contact me on Discord
